leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 神经科学-电生理与神经信号生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→事件/分选→解码→实时→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 实时系统 + 分析库 + GUI

queries: [WEB] spike sorting manual curation gui github
[WEB] eeg annotation software open source github

tools.name: MNE-Preprocessing
tools.one_line_profile: Artifact reduction pipeline for EEG raw data based on MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python repository designed to reduce artifacts in electroencephalographic (EEG) raw data using basic and unanimous approaches step-by-step, built upon the MNE-Python library.

tools.name: PyEEGLab
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for analyzing and manipulating EEG data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for the analysis and manipulation of Electroencephalography (EEG) data, providing tools for processing neural signals.

tools.name: aind-ephys-spikesort-kilosort25-full
tools.one_line_profile: Full electrophysiology spike sorting pipeline using Kilosort2.5
tools.detailed_description: A CodeOcean capsule providing a full electrophysiology analysis pipeline that utilizes Kilosort2.5 via SpikeInterface for spike sorting, developed by the Allen Institute for Neural Dynamics.

tools.name: EEGapp
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB application for automated EEG data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based graphical application designed to automate the analysis of EEG data, facilitating signal processing and interpretation for researchers.

tools.name: BeMoBIL Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for mobile brain/body imaging (MoBI) analysis
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for the analysis and visualization of mobile brain/body imaging data, wrapping EEGLAB and MOBILAB functionalities with additional features for motion and EEG integration.

tools.name: DataHigh
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for visualizing high-dimensional neural activity
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface designed for visualizing and interacting with high-dimensional neural activity data, aiding in the exploration of complex neural population states.

tools.name: Svarog
tools.one_line_profile: EEG Signal Viewer, Annotator, Analyzer, and Recorder
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based application for viewing, annotating, analyzing, and recording EEG signals, serving as a comprehensive tool for electrophysiological data management.

tools.name: CM-graph
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for multichannel EEG-EMG connectivity analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox extending mne-tools for multichannel EEG-EMG connectivity analysis, focusing on graph and network theory applications for investigating conditions like stroke and ASD.

tools.name: Resting State Analysis Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for resting state EEG microstate and frequency analysis
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB pipeline for processing resting-state EEG data, covering steps from raw data preprocessing to power/frequency analysis and microstate analysis.

tools.name: OpenMuse
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to record and stream Muse S Athena signals
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for recording and streaming signals from the Muse S Athena headband, developed by researchers to facilitate access to consumer-grade EEG data.

tools.name: warpAnnotations
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for transforming annotations between spatial datasets
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool developed by the Francis Crick Institute to transform annotations (points, skeletons, meshes) between different spatial datasets, useful in connectomics and spatial biology.

tools.name: PyCartool
tools.one_line_profile: I/O interface between Cartool and Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing input/output functionality to bridge Cartool (a brain imaging software) and Python, facilitating data exchange and analysis workflows.

tools.name: ePAC
tools.one_line_profile: Extended Phase-Amplitude Coupling EEGLAB toolbox
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB toolbox for extended Phase-Amplitude Coupling (ePAC) analysis, featuring automatic assessment of coupling origins to distinguish between reliable and ambiguous signals.

tools.name: PhysLean
tools.one_line_profile: Library for digitalizing physics results into Lean
tools.detailed_description: A project dedicated to formalizing results from physics into the Lean theorem prover, enabling rigorous verification of physical theories and mathematical foundations.

tools.name: NeuralEE
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated elastic embedding for scRNA-seq visualization
tools.detailed_description: A GPU-accelerated Python package implementing elastic embedding dimensionality reduction specifically for the visualization of large-scale scRNA-seq data.

tools.name: Viziphant
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization library for electrophysiological data objects in Elephant
tools.detailed_description: Viziphant provides visualization capabilities for electrophysiological data analysis results generated by the Elephant (Electrophysiology Analysis Toolkit) library. It focuses on visualizing spike trains, local field potentials, and statistical analysis outcomes.

tools.name: PhyCV
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-inspired computer vision library
tools.detailed_description: PhyCV is a computer vision library that incorporates algorithms inspired by laws of physics (e.g., phase-stretch transform) to perform image processing tasks like edge detection and feature enhancement.

tools.name: Spyglass
tools.one_line_profile: Neuroscience data analysis framework for reproducible research
tools.detailed_description: Spyglass is a data analysis framework designed to facilitate reproducible research in neuroscience. It provides pipelines for data ingestion, processing (spike sorting, LFP), and management, specifically tailored for electrophysiology data.

tools.name: ESINet
tools.one_line_profile: EEG inverse solution using artificial neural networks
tools.detailed_description: ESINet is a Python package that solves the EEG inverse problem using artificial neural networks. It integrates with MNE-Python data structures to estimate brain source activity from EEG recordings.

tools.name: Kilosort
tools.one_line_profile: Fast spike sorting software for high-channel count probes
tools.detailed_description: Kilosort is a MATLAB/Python-based software package for spike sorting, specifically designed to handle large-scale electrophysiology data from high-density probes (e.g., Neuropixels). It performs drift correction and clustering to identify neuronal units.

tools.name: rastermap
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization method for high-dimensional neural data
tools.detailed_description: Rastermap is a dimensionality reduction and visualization tool for large-scale neural activity data. It sorts neurons to reveal temporal patterns and structures in the data, creating an organized raster plot.

tools.name: NVIDIA PhysX SDK
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable multi-platform physics simulation engine
tools.detailed_description: The NVIDIA PhysX SDK is a scalable physics engine used for simulating rigid body dynamics, collision detection, and fluid dynamics. While widely used in gaming, it is also a core component for scientific simulations, robotics, and digital twins in the NVIDIA Omniverse ecosystem.

tools.name: NVIDIA Modulus (formerly physicsnemo)
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-ML framework for building and training physics-informed models
tools.detailed_description: NVIDIA Modulus (repo name physicsnemo) is a deep learning framework for developing Physics-ML models. It combines physics constraints (PDEs) with data to train models for scientific problems like fluid dynamics, heat transfer, and structural mechanics.

tools.name: PhysX SDK (GameWorks)
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time physics engine for simulation
tools.detailed_description: The NVIDIA PhysX SDK provides real-time physics simulation capabilities. This repository represents the version maintained under the GameWorks umbrella, widely used for rigid body and particle simulations in research and development.

tools.name: PhysX SDK 3.4
tools.one_line_profile: Legacy version of the PhysX physics simulation engine
tools.detailed_description: Version 3.4 of the NVIDIA PhysX SDK. While older, it is still used in various legacy simulation environments and research projects requiring stable physics computation.

tools.name: Elephant
tools.one_line_profile: Electrophysiology Analysis Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: Elephant is a library for the analysis of electrophysiological data, including spike trains, local field potentials (LFP), and intracellular signals. It provides a wide range of functions for statistics, spectral analysis, and spike train metrics.

tools.name: ephyviewer
tools.one_line_profile: Simple viewers for electrophysiological signals and events
tools.detailed_description: ephyviewer is a Python library based on PyQt and pyqtgraph for creating interactive viewers for electrophysiological data. It supports visualizing signals, events, epochs, and video synchronization.

tools.name: FLUX
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for MEG data analysis using MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: FLUX is a pipeline for processing and analyzing Magnetoencephalography (MEG) data. It leverages MNE-Python to provide a structured workflow for cleaning, artifact removal, and source estimation.

tools.name: SpectraVis
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive tool for analyzing functional networks in time and frequency
tools.detailed_description: SpectraVis is a web-based application for visualizing and analyzing task-related functional brain networks. It allows users to explore dynamic connectivity patterns across time and frequency domains.

tools.name: Nirstorm
tools.one_line_profile: Brainstorm plugin for fNIRS data analysis
tools.detailed_description: Nirstorm is a plugin for the Brainstorm software that adds capabilities for analyzing functional Near-Infrared Spectroscopy (fNIRS) data. It includes functions for data import, preprocessing, and modified Beer-Lambert law estimation.

tools.name: Matilda
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-task framework for single-cell multimodal omics data
tools.detailed_description: Matilda is a deep learning framework designed for single-cell multimodal omics data. It performs multiple tasks simultaneously, including data simulation, dimension reduction, visualization, classification, and feature selection.

tools.name: EDFbrowser
tools.one_line_profile: Universal viewer and toolbox for time-series storage files like EEG, EMG, and ECG
tools.detailed_description: A free, open-source, multiplatform viewer and toolbox intended for medical time-series storage files such as EEG, EMG, ECG, and BioImpedance. It supports the European Data Format (EDF) and allows for visualization and basic analysis of physiological signals.

tools.name: SpikeInterface
tools.one_line_profile: Unified Python framework for spike sorting pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based module for creating flexible and robust spike sorting pipelines. It wraps multiple spike sorting algorithms (sorters) into a unified interface, handling data recording, preprocessing, sorting, and post-processing validation.

tools.name: SpikeInterface-GUI
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for visualizing and curating SpikeInterface objects
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface designed for SpikeInterface objects, allowing users to visualize recording signals, spike sorting results, and curate units interactively.

tools.name: Spikely
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for running spike sorting algorithms on extracellular data
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface built on top of SpikeInterface for running popular spike sorting algorithms on extracellular data of any file format, simplifying the workflow for users without coding experience.

tools.name: SpikeWidgets
tools.one_line_profile: Widgets for spike sorting and electrophysiology visualization
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python-based widgets for visualizing spike sorting results and electrophysiology data, designed to work with the SpikeInterface ecosystem.

tools.name: EEG-Annotate
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for annotating continuous EEG signals
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based toolset designed for the manual annotation of continuous EEG signals, facilitating the creation of ground truth data for artifact detection or event marking.

tools.name: BLINKER
tools.one_line_profile: Automated blink detector for EEG
tools.detailed_description: An automated pipeline for detecting eye blinks in EEG data, useful for artifact removal and preprocessing of electrophysiological signals.

tools.name: EEG-Clean-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for EEG standardized preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB tools for standardized preprocessing of EEG data, including artifact cleaning and signal conditioning.

tools.name: PhySO
tools.one_line_profile: Physical Symbolic Optimization for recovering analytical expressions
tools.detailed_description: A deep symbolic regression framework designed to recover analytical physical laws from data. It uses deep reinforcement learning to search for symbolic expressions that fit the data while respecting physical units and constraints.

tools.name: PhysGaussian
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Integrated 3D Gaussians for Generative Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A method and tool for generating 3D dynamics by integrating physics simulation with 3D Gaussian Splatting, enabling realistic synthesis of motion and deformation in generated 3D content.

tools.name: PhysDreamer
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-based interaction generation for 3D objects
tools.detailed_description: A tool for synthesizing realistic physical interactions with 3D objects using data-driven priors, enabling the simulation of how objects respond to physical forces in a generated environment.

tools.name: BrainBrowser
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based visualization tools for neurological data
tools.detailed_description: A set of web-based 3D visualization tools for neurological data, allowing for the exploration of surface and volume data directly in a web browser using WebGL.

tools.name: SourceMesh
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB-based MEG/EEG overlay and network plotter
tools.detailed_description: A multipurpose MATLAB tool for plotting MEG/EEG source overlays and networks on brain meshes, facilitating the visualization of functional connectivity and source localization results.

tools.name: BrainBeats
tools.one_line_profile: EEGLAB plugin for joint EEG and cardiovascular signal analysis
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox implemented as an EEGLAB plugin that allows for the joint processing and analysis of EEG and cardiovascular signals (ECG/PPG), enabling research into heart-brain interactions.

tools.name: UnitRefine
tools.one_line_profile: Machine-learning toolbox for spike sorting curation
tools.detailed_description: A machine-learning based toolbox designed to simplify and automate the curation of spike sorting results, reducing the need for manual intervention in electrophysiological data analysis.

tools.name: DSI Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed EEG source imaging toolbox for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: A distributed EEG source imaging toolbox designed as an extension for EEGLAB, facilitating source localization and imaging analysis of EEG data.

tools.name: headModel
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB/EEGLAB toolbox for EEG forward and inverse problem modeling
tools.detailed_description: The headModel toolbox encapsulates common routines for EEG forward and inverse problems into a single interface, facilitating source localization and head modeling within the EEGLAB ecosystem.

tools.name: FrameGrabberPlugin
tools.one_line_profile: Video frame grabbing plugin for Open Ephys GUI
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Open Ephys acquisition GUI that enables synchronized video frame grabbing alongside electrophysiological data recording.

tools.name: RPiCameraPlugin
tools.one_line_profile: Raspberry Pi camera control plugin for Open Ephys
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Open Ephys GUI designed to control a Raspberry Pi camera, facilitating behavioral monitoring during electrophysiology experiments.

tools.name: loretaplugin
tools.one_line_profile: EEGLAB plugin for LORETA KEY data export
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that bridges EEGLAB and LORETA KEY software, allowing users to export EEG data for Low Resolution Electromagnetic Tomography analysis.

tools.name: Microstate-EEGlab-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for EEG microstate analysis in EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox integrated with EEGLAB for performing EEG microstate analysis, a method for studying the temporal dynamics of resting-state brain activity.

tools.name: autoreject
tools.one_line_profile: Automated artifact rejection and repair for M/EEG data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for automated rejection and repair of bad trials and sensors in MEG and EEG data, improving data quality for subsequent analysis.

tools.name: PyMNE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface to the MNE-Python library
tools.detailed_description: A Julia wrapper for the MNE-Python library, enabling Julia users to access MNE's comprehensive suite of tools for MEG and EEG data analysis.

tools.name: eegvis
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB tools for EEG data visualization
tools.detailed_description: A repository of MATLAB tools designed to assist in the plotting and visualization of EEG data, supporting custom analysis pipelines.

tools.name: mne_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Utility tools for MNE-Python EEG analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python utility functions and tools extending the MNE-Python toolbox for specific EEG data analysis tasks.

tools.name: EEGLAB-specparam
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB wrapper for FOOOF spectral parametrization
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB wrapper for the FOOOF (Fitting Oscillations & One Over F) toolkit, enabling spectral parametrization analysis directly within the EEGLAB environment.

tools.name: Phyllum_public
tools.one_line_profile: Phy plugin for cerebellar neuropixel analysis
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the 'phy' spike sorting visualization tool, specialized for the automatic analysis of neuropixel recordings in the cerebellum.

tools.name: braindecode
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for EEG/MEG signal decoding
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning software library designed for decoding and analyzing EEG, ECG, and MEG signals, providing implementations of state-of-the-art neural network architectures.

tools.name: brainstorm3
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive analysis platform for MEG/EEG/electrophysiology
tools.detailed_description: A collaborative, open-source application dedicated to the analysis of brain recordings: MEG, EEG, fNIRS, ECoG, depth electrodes, and multiunit electrophysiology.

tools.name: eegtools
tools.one_line_profile: Python modules for EEG data handling and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python modules for EEG analysis, including loaders for EDF+/BDF formats, scalp plotting utilities, and common spatial filters.

tools.name: roiextractors
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for extracting and handling optical imaging data
tools.detailed_description: A Python module for extracting, converting, and handling optical imaging data (calcium imaging) from various file formats, inspired by the design of SpikeInterface.

tools.name: sigviewer
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance viewer for biosignals
tools.detailed_description: A viewing application designed for biosignals (EEG, EMG, ECG, etc.), supporting various file formats and providing efficient visualization for long recordings.

tools.name: meggie
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for MNE-Python based MEG/EEG analysis
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly graphical user interface built on MNE-Python, designed to facilitate MEG and EEG analysis across multiple subjects.

tools.name: sigviewer-sdr
tools.one_line_profile: Signal viewing tool for SDR/IQ data
tools.detailed_description: A Qt-based signal viewing and editing tool optimized for large datasets, specifically IQ signals collected from Software Defined Radios (SDR).

tools.name: restingIAF
tools.one_line_profile: Resting-state individual alpha frequency estimation
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for estimating the individual alpha frequency (IAF) from resting-state EEG data, integrated with EEGLAB.

tools.name: phy
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization and spike sorting tool
tools.detailed_description: An interactive visualization tool for manual spike sorting of large-scale electrophysiological data, designed to work with automated sorting outputs.

tools.name: eegUtils
tools.one_line_profile: R package for EEG data processing and plotting
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing utilities for the processing, manipulation, and visualization of electroencephalography (EEG) data.

tools.name: datoviz
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance GPU rendering for scientific visualization
tools.detailed_description: A library for high-performance scientific data visualization using Vulkan for GPU acceleration, suitable for large-scale datasets.

tools.name: mvpalab
tools.one_line_profile: Multivariate Pattern Analysis (MVPA) toolbox for MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox designed to facilitate Multivariate Pattern Analysis (MVPA) decoding tasks for neuroimaging data.

tools.name: eegtools-matlab-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB EEG analysis pipeline framework
tools.detailed_description: A complete EEG analysis framework written in MATLAB, leveraging EEGLAB and Brainstorm for pipeline management and data processing.

tools.name: PHYRE
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark environment for physical reasoning in AI
tools.detailed_description: PHYRE (Physical Reasoning) is a benchmark for physical reasoning that provides a set of physics puzzles in a simulated 2D environment. It is designed to test the ability of AI agents to predict physical outcomes and solve tasks involving simple mechanics.

tools.name: Neurosift
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based visualization for NWB and DANDI data
tools.detailed_description: Neurosift is a web-based tool for visualizing and exploring neurophysiology data stored in the Neurodata Without Borders (NWB) format, specifically integrated with the DANDI archive.

tools.name: neu3d
tools.one_line_profile: 3D visualization engine for neural morphology data
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript-based 3D visualization engine designed for rendering neural data in SWC format, used by the FlyCircuit database for visualizing fruit fly brain connectivity.

tools.name: EEGLAB AAR Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Artifact Removal plugin for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB plugin implementing Automatic Artifact Removal (AAR) algorithms to clean EEG data by removing artifacts such as EOG, EMG, and others using blind source separation methods.

tools.name: CTAP
tools.one_line_profile: Computational Testing for Automated Preprocessing of EEG
tools.detailed_description: CTAP is a MATLAB toolbox that extends EEGLAB to provide a framework for batch processing and automated preprocessing of EEG data, including quality control and method comparison.

tools.name: MARA
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple Artifact Rejection Algorithm for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: MARA is an EEGLAB plugin for automatic artifact rejection in EEG data. It uses supervised learning to classify independent components as artifacts or neural signals.

tools.name: Combinato
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for spike sorting and visualization
tools.detailed_description: Combinato is a complete framework for spike sorting, including artifact rejection, automatic clustering, and a GUI for manual refinement and visualization of clusters.

tools.name: phyloseq
tools.one_line_profile: Handling and analysis of high-throughput microbiome census data
tools.detailed_description: phyloseq is an R package for the import, storage, analysis, and graphical display of complex phylogenetic sequencing data, particularly suited for microbiome analysis.

tools.name: Neurotic
tools.one_line_profile: Curate, visualize, annotate, and share behavioral ephys data
tools.detailed_description: Neurotic is a Python library and app for curating, visualizing, annotating, and sharing electrophysiology data synchronized with video behavior, facilitating data exploration.

tools.name: Rustymind
tools.one_line_profile: Driver and parser for NeuroSky MindWave EEG headset
tools.detailed_description: Rustymind is a Rust library that acts as a driver and parser for the NeuroSky MindWave EEG headset, enabling real-time access to brainwave data for research or applications.

tools.name: KNOSSOS
tools.one_line_profile: Software for visualization and annotation of 3D image data for neural morphology
tools.detailed_description: KNOSSOS is a software tool designed for the rapid reconstruction of neural morphology and connectivity through the visualization and annotation of 3D image data. It facilitates the analysis of large-scale microscopy datasets.

tools.name: WizardHat
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time processing and plotting of data streamed over LSL for BCI
tools.detailed_description: WizardHat is a Python tool designed for real-time processing and plotting of data streamed over Lab Streaming Layer (LSL), with a specific focus on facilitating student-led Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) projects.

tools.name: MNE-BIDS
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS-compatible dataset handling for MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: MNE-BIDS is a Python package that facilitates reading and writing neuroimaging datasets compatible with the Brain Imaging Data Structure (BIDS) specification, integrating seamlessly with MNE-Python.

tools.name: MNE-BIDS-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Automated processing pipeline for electrophysiological datasets
tools.detailed_description: MNE-BIDS-Pipeline provides a full-automated processing workflow for electrophysiological data (EEG/MEG) organized in BIDS format, leveraging MNE-Python for analysis steps.

tools.name: MNE-Connectivity
tools.one_line_profile: Connectivity analysis algorithms for MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: MNE-Connectivity is a library dedicated to computing functional and effective connectivity measures (such as coherence, Granger causality) on MNE-Python data structures.

tools.name: MNE-CPP
tools.one_line_profile: C++ Framework for Electrophysiology
tools.detailed_description: MNE-CPP is a cross-platform C++ framework for real-time acquisition, visualization, and analysis of electrophysiological data (EEG/MEG), providing high-performance tools compatible with MNE.

tools.name: MNE-Denoise
tools.one_line_profile: Narrow-band artifact removal for MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: MNE-Denoise provides specialized tools for removing narrow-band artifacts (like power-line noise) from electrophysiological data using harmonic regression techniques.

tools.name: MNE-HCP
tools.one_line_profile: MNE-Python interface for Human Connectome Project data
tools.detailed_description: MNE-HCP provides tools to read and process MEG data from the Human Connectome Project (HCP) using the MNE-Python framework.

tools.name: MNE-HFO
tools.one_line_profile: High-frequency oscillation detection for iEEG
tools.detailed_description: MNE-HFO is a Python package for the detection and analysis of High-Frequency Oscillations (HFOs) in intracranial EEG data, compatible with BIDS and MNE-Python.

tools.name: MNE-LSL
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time brain signal streaming framework
tools.detailed_description: MNE-LSL provides a framework for real-time streaming of brain signals using the Lab Streaming Layer (LSL) protocol, integrated with MNE-Python for online processing.

tools.name: MNE-Python
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for MEG and EEG data analysis
tools.detailed_description: MNE-Python is an open-source Python software for exploring, visualizing, and analyzing human neurophysiological data (MEG, EEG, sEEG, ECoG, fNIRS, etc.). It provides a comprehensive suite of algorithms for preprocessing, source estimation, time-frequency analysis, and statistical testing.

tools.name: MNE-Qt-Browser
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance 2D data browser for MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: MNE-Qt-Browser is a backend for MNE-Python's visualization functions, providing a fast and interactive 2D data browser based on Qt for reviewing raw electrophysiological data.

tools.name: MNE-R
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: MNE-R allows R users to access MNE-Python functionality, enabling the processing of electrophysiological data within the R environment.

tools.name: MNE-Realtime
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time data analysis with MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: MNE-Realtime allows for the real-time acquisition and processing of MEG/EEG data using MNE-Python, suitable for neurofeedback and BCI applications.

tools.name: MNE-RSA
tools.one_line_profile: Representational Similarity Analysis for MEG/EEG
tools.detailed_description: MNE-RSA is a library for performing Representational Similarity Analysis (RSA) on MEG and EEG data, allowing researchers to relate neural activity patterns to computational models or behavioral measures.

tools.name: NeuroKit2
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Python toolbox for neurophysiological signal processing
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly package providing easy access to advanced biosignal processing routines for ECG, PPG, EDA, EMG, and EEG data, including preprocessing, feature extraction, and visualization.

tools.name: ephypype
tools.one_line_profile: Electrophysiology analysis pipelines based on Nipype
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing pipelines for electrophysiological data analysis (EEG/MEG), leveraging the Nipype framework for workflow management and reproducibility.

tools.name: NeuroScope
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced viewer for electrophysiological and behavioral data
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool designed for displaying and navigating large datasets of electrophysiological recordings (LFP, spikes) and behavioral events.

tools.name: GEDAI
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized Eigendecomposition-based Denoising plugin for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB plugin implementing Generalized Eigendecomposition (GED) for denoising EEG data, helping to separate signal from noise components.

tools.name: preprocessing_pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing workflows for EEG, MEG, and fMRI data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of preprocessing pipelines utilizing MNE-Python and Nipype for cleaning and preparing neuroimaging and electrophysiological data for analysis.

tools.name: eeghub
tools.one_line_profile: State machine for controlling EEG preprocessing steps
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool that orchestrates various EEG preprocessing steps using popular toolboxes like FieldTrip, SPM, and EEGLAB.

tools.name: open-ephys-matlab-tools
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB interface for Open Ephys data
tools.detailed_description: A library providing functions to read and interact with data formats generated by the Open Ephys GUI within the MATLAB environment.

tools.name: open-ephys-python-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Open Ephys data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for loading and manipulating data recorded with the Open Ephys GUI, supporting various data formats.

tools.name: Open Ephys GUI
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for multichannel electrophysiology acquisition
tools.detailed_description: An open-source plugin-based software platform for acquiring, processing, and visualizing extracellular electrophysiology data in real-time.

tools.name: eeg_viewer
tools.one_line_profile: Simple EEG data viewer for MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight MATLAB-based graphical user interface for viewing and inspecting EEG data.

tools.name: HEPLAB
tools.one_line_profile: ECG event detection for Heartbeat Evoked Potential analysis
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for detecting ECG events (R-wave, T-wave) specifically tailored for preprocessing data for Heartbeat Evoked Potential (HEP) research.

tools.name: phy1-plugins
tools.one_line_profile: Plugins for the Phy1 spike sorting visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A collection of plugins extending the functionality of Phy1, a tool for visualizing and refining spike sorting results.

tools.name: phy2-plugins
tools.one_line_profile: Plugins for the Phy2 spike sorting visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: Extensions for Phy2 to enhance spike sorting curation and visualization capabilities.

tools.name: easy-plot-neural
tools.one_line_profile: Plotting utilities for neural spiking data
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library for generating raster plots, PSTHs, and other event-aligned averages for neural activity analysis.

tools.name: phyphox-android
tools.one_line_profile: Physical phone experiments app
tools.detailed_description: An Android application that allows using the phone's sensors for physical experiments and data acquisition, suitable for educational and basic scientific data collection.

tools.name: MindWaveSpectrogram
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Spectrogram visualization for NeuroSky MindWave
tools.detailed_description: A Processing script for visualizing EEG power data from NeuroSky MindWave devices as a 3D spectrogram.

tools.name: Medical_physics_imageJ
tools.one_line_profile: ImageJ scripts for medical physics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and plugins for performing specific image analysis tasks in medical physics using ImageJ.

tools.name: eeg_positions
tools.one_line_profile: Compute and plot standard EEG electrode positions
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to compute and visualize standard EEG electrode positions (e.g., 10-20, 10-10 systems) on spherical or realistic head models.

tools.name: ICLabel
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic EEG independent component classification
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB plugin for the automated classification of independent components (ICs) from EEG data, distinguishing brain signals from artifacts.

tools.name: PACTools
tools.one_line_profile: Phase-Amplitude Coupling analysis for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB plugin to compute and visualize Phase-Amplitude Coupling (PAC) in electrophysiological signals using various methods.

tools.name: SIFT
tools.one_line_profile: Source Information Flow Toolbox for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolbox for modeling and visualizing multivariate causality and information flow between electrophysiological sources (EEG/ECoG/MEG).

tools.name: dipfit
tools.one_line_profile: Source localization plugin for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for EEGLAB that performs dipole source localization of independent components, mapping scalp maps to brain sources.

tools.name: EEGLAB
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive toolbox for electrophysiological signal processing
tools.detailed_description: A widely used open-source environment for processing continuous and event-related EEG, MEG, and other electrophysiological data, featuring ICA, time-frequency analysis, and artifact rejection.

tools.name: EEGPrep
tools.one_line_profile: Automated preprocessing pipeline for human EEG
tools.detailed_description: An automated tool for preprocessing human EEG data, built upon a benchmarked EEGLAB pipeline to standardize data cleaning steps.

tools.name: neuroscanio
tools.one_line_profile: EEGLAB plugin to import Neuroscan data formats
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB function and EEGLAB plugin designed to import data from Neuroscan systems, facilitating the integration of Neuroscan EEG data into the EEGLAB processing pipeline.

tools.name: nsgportal
tools.one_line_profile: EEGLAB plugin for submitting jobs to the Neuroscience Gateway (NSG)
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for EEGLAB that allows users to submit computationally intensive EEG analysis jobs directly to the Neuroscience Gateway (NSG) High Performance Computing (HPC) resources.

tools.name: SeeCogViewer
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based 3D visualization tool for cognitive neuroscience data
tools.detailed_description: A 3D visualization tool, likely web-based, designed for viewing and interacting with cognitive neuroscience data models or brain structures.

tools.name: Kontroller
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB interface for NI-DAQ control in experiments
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB package providing a GUI and programmable interface for National Instruments Data Acquisition (NI-DAQ) hardware, designed to automate and control experimental data acquisition.

tools.name: PvsNP
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolbox for neurophysiological data analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed to facilitate the reproducible analysis and visualization of neurophysiological data, providing utilities for handling standard data formats and generating plots.

tools.name: streams
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time timeseries data viewer for EEG
tools.detailed_description: A viewer application for visualizing EEG and other stream-like timeseries data, likely supporting real-time data inspection.

tools.name: eeg-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end EEG processing pipeline using MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for EEG data processing, including cleaning, filtering, Independent Component Analysis (ICA), mass-univariate analysis, and decoding, built on top of MNE-Python.

tools.name: CountingSheepPSG
tools.one_line_profile: EEGLAB-compatible tool for sleep stage scoring and PSG analysis
tools.detailed_description: Software compatible with EEGLAB for manual and visual scoring of sleep stages, signal processing, and event marking in polysomnographic (PSG) data.

tools.name: detect_spindles
tools.one_line_profile: Automated sleep spindle detection method for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based method utilizing EEGLAB functions to automatically detect sleep spindles in EEG data, useful for sleep research analysis.

tools.name: neuroscope
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for neural network activations
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to visualize activations within neural networks (visual cortex models), aiding in the interpretation of deep learning models in the context of neuro-AI.

tools.name: phase-calculator
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time phase estimator plugin for Open Ephys GUI
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the Open Ephys GUI that performs real-time continuous phase estimation of neural signals, enabling closed-loop experiments.

tools.name: ERPLAB
tools.one_line_profile: EEGLAB extension for ERP analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive MATLAB toolbox tightly integrated with EEGLAB for the processing, visualization, and analysis of Event-Related Potential (ERP) data, offering both GUI and scripting capabilities.

tools.name: UnfoldMakie.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia plotting library for EEG and regression ERPs
tools.detailed_description: A visualization package for Julia, based on Makie.jl, specifically designed for plotting EEG data and results from Unfold.jl regression ERP analyses.

tools.name: neuroskymindwavecapture
tools.one_line_profile: Data capture and plotting for NeuroSky Mindwave headsets
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to capture and plot raw EEG data from consumer-grade NeuroSky Mindwave headsets, facilitating low-cost EEG research or prototyping.

tools.name: eeg-connectivity
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for EEG connectivity analysis using MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A framework built on MNE-Python for computing various connectivity measures from EEG data, aiding in the analysis of functional brain networks.

tools.name: erptools
tools.one_line_profile: Miscellaneous functions for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utility functions for EEGLAB, extending its capabilities for ERP analysis and data handling.

tools.name: firfilt
tools.one_line_profile: FIR filter design and application for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB plugin providing routines for designing and applying Windowed Sinc, Parks-McClellan, and Moving Average Finite Impulse Response (FIR) filters to EEG data.

tools.name: mne_microstates
tools.one_line_profile: EEG microstate analysis for MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing microstate analysis on EEG data, designed to integrate with the MNE-Python ecosystem.

tools.name: wonambi
tools.one_line_profile: Package for EEG/ECoG analysis and sleep scoring GUI
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for analyzing electrophysiology data (EEG, ECoG) supporting various formats, including a GUI for visualization and sleep stage scoring.

tools.name: libxdf
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for loading XDF files
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for reading and loading Extensible Data Format (XDF) files, which are commonly used for multi-modal data streams in LabStreamingLayer (LSL) applications.

tools.name: xdf-EEGLAB
tools.one_line_profile: XDF data importer for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB plugin that allows users to import XDF (Extensible Data Format) files directly into EEGLAB for analysis.

tools.name: ephys_analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Patch clamp electrophysiology data analysis tools
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for the processing and analysis of patch clamp electrophysiology data, likely providing specialized functions for this domain.

tools.name: MNEflow
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for EEG/MEG decoding integrating MNE-Python and TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: MNEflow is a Python library designed to bridge the gap between MNE-Python's data handling capabilities and TensorFlow's deep learning frameworks. It allows researchers to build, train, and evaluate neural network models for decoding cognitive states or stimuli from electrophysiological data (EEG/MEG). It features a modular interface for constructing custom models and includes interpretability tools for analyzing learned patterns.
